pullRequest.title: [2.34] fix: fetch unique values during metadata import
pullRequest.bodyText:
DHIS2-8267
Introduce new component that fetches only unique attributes for a
Metadata object during Metadata import pre-heat (instead of executing
something like "select * from table" now the system executes "select
column_a, column_c from table".
Force the query to be read-only to prevent Hibernate to syncronize the
data with the database
Refactored Metadata import validation into Validation Rules, in order
to improve testability and "code-cleaness"
"forward-port" from 2.33 c346476

commit.message:
fix: fetch unique values during metadata import

- DHIS2-8267
- Introduce new component that fetches only unique attributes for a
  Metadata object during Metadata import pre-heat (instead of executing
something like "select * from table" now the system executes "select
column_a, column_c from table".
- Force the query to be read-only to prevent Hibernate to syncronize the
  data with the database
- Refactored Metadata import validation into Validation Rules, in order
to improve testability and "code-cleaness"
- "forward-port" from 2.33 c346476902b87567ae335875745c933c2ace61c7

nodes.bodyText: Several codestyle issues in this file ( paranthesis missing spaces )
